data.name: 岛中夜鬼 Yato's story
data.detailed_description:
The story background of the game "Yato’s story" comes from the original mobile game 《Arknights》,
which tells about the task of the A4 team supporting senior operators to investigate the mutated “stone mine” .

The game settings are in line with the original work, it is a pixel action game.
Whether you are a fan of the original or not, you can experience the fun in the game.
I hope everyone will have a good time.

■Story
After receiving the response task sent by the doctor, the A4 team rushed to the “stone mine” to support the senior operator Surtr.
However, after the scheduled evacuation time, there was still no contact from Surtr.
Therefore, the doctor decided to let the A4 team go to the depths of the mine to find the whereabouts of Surtr...

■Game Features
You can defeat enemies with normal attacks, or use skills to unleash powerful skills.
Defeat enemies to collect fragments, trade and upgrade with merchants to gain more powerful props and abilities!
Defeat the enemy with flamboyant skills and bring Miss Sturt back to the Doctor!

data.short_description: This is a pixel action game based on the second creation under the background of the mobile game "Arknights". This story start with a special operation, telling the story of Yato and Surtr. Use your gorgeous skills to defeat the enemies hidden in the dark!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/ Windows 8/ Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 520；1G or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 后期更新可能需要更多的磁盘空间。
